parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items to show on each page. Max 50.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Method to sort by: newest, oldest, alphabetical, most_videos, most_subscribed, or most_recently_updated.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: The numeric id of the channel or its url name.

parameters.name: full_response
parameters.description: Set this parameter to get back the full video information

parameters.name: summary_response
parameters.description: Set this parameter to get back more information.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID number or username of the user. A token may be used instead.
